<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/54635</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>54635</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_431</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_431</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">Similarity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Similitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Similaridade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Somiglianza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιότητα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de semejanza de polígonos. Se estudia en particular el teorema de Thales de semejanza de triángulos y se muestran algunas aplicaciones geométricas de este teorema.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of similarity of polygons. Thales's theorem about the similarity of triangles is studied, and some of the geometrical applications of this theorem are shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Thales's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Ähnlichkeit der Polygone zu erklären. 
Theorem Thaless über die Ähnlichkeit der Dreiecke wird 
studiert, und einige der geometrischen Anwendungen dieses Theorems 
werden gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la similitude des polygones. 
Le théorème de Thales au sujet de la similitude des 
triangles est étudié, et certaines des applications géométriques 
de ce théorème sont montrées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da similaridade dos polygons. O theorem de Thales 
sobre a similaridade dos triângulos é estudado, e algumas das 
aplicações geométricas deste theorem são mostradas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto di somiglianza dei poligoni. Il teorema del
Thales circa la somiglianza dei triangoli è studiato ed alcune delle 
applicazioni geometriche di questo teorema sono indicate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της ομοιότητας των πολυγώνων. Το 
θεώρημα του Thales για την ομοιότητα των τριγώνων μελετάται, 
και μερικές από τις γεωμετρικές εφαρμογές αυτού του θεωρήματος 
εμφανίζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Thaless</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planimetrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">similitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le théorème de Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">similaridade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorem de Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria plana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">somiglianza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teorema del Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria piana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεώρημα Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία αεροπλάνων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
